description:
The mysterious girl is idol Serika Ginyuuin. During her concert Souta’s powers increase and time freezes. No. 0 tells Souta he must leave or the world will be destroyed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Minna de Odoru Made mo Nai, Koko wa Ore Hitori ga Odoreba Juubun Da
Pas la peine qu`on danse tous. Si je danse seul, ça suffit amplement
We Don`t All Have to Dance. I Can Dance by Myself
ليس مفروضًا علينا أن نرقص كلنا، يمكنني ان أرقص بمفردي
みんなで踊るまでもない, ここは俺一人が踊れば十分だ
